item.title: Welcome Migrator
item.description:
Welcome to the new blog. I got kinda frustrated with worpress especially with its distinct lack of code highlighting support and annoying workflow so here we are!. Now we are running on Hugo using a (highly) modified ‘slender’ theme.

For anyone new, this blog focuses on programming and design but also branches to other topics. I’ll be slowly migrating the posts’s over so probably no new posts for a while.

Here’s to a better blog! -Ewan
